author: sky.cactus
content: Would it reduce PoS transition risk in any way to have the fork block be somewhat random in its selection?

author: sky.cactus
content: PoS has a mechanism for random number generation, what if we just set it up such that the PoS transition was "sometime after block X" but we used RANDAO to figure out the *exact* block, and the transition would be "sudden".  So we wouldn't know when until all of a sudden it was now.
